content: दाहः [दह्-भावे-घञ्] {@--1@} Burning, conflagration; दाहशक्तिमिव कृष्णवर्त्मनि <ls>R. 11. 42</ls>; छेदो दंशस्य दाहो वा <ls>M. 4. 4</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 14.</ls> {@--2@} Glowing redness (as of the sky). {@--3@} The sensation of burning, internal heat. {@--4@} Feverish or morbid heat.
दाह, दाहक, दाहन, दाह्य ,¦ &c. See under दह्.
